faq.question: Under which license is Log4js available?

answer.p: Log4js is availabel under Apache License Version 2.0.

faq.question: Why I have to set an Appender? What is an Appender?

answer.p: Appenders are special implementations for different logging behaviours. In some cases you probably want to log to a popup window, in other situations you want to sent the client logs to the server to store them there.
log4js has a very flexible for these cirumstances and allows own implementations for this. These are the appenders.
There are already some appenders available within log4js, have also a look at the API documentation:
Probably you have also an appender, to share with the comunitiy?
